title: Combi Flora Antipylori with Pylopass
author: Shopkunde
description: Combi Flora Antipylori - with the bacterial strain Pylopass Infections with the stomach bacterium Helicobacter pylori can lead to various digestive complaints and other symptoms in the digestive tract. The new Combi Flora...
text:
[effective nature](https://www.myfairtrade.com/en/effective-nature/)
-
Combi Flora Antipylori is an innovative product from effective nature to be taken for symptoms caused by the stomach bacterium Helicobacter pylori, which affects 50 percent of the world's population. The pathogen can cause frequent heartburn and bloating, for example, but also loss of appetite. Combi Flora Antipylori contains the Pylopass™, which binds H. pylori and contributes to its elimination.
-
- With Pylopass™ - Innovative, effective, preventive
- Binds the gastric bacterium H. pylori
- For the dietary treatment of Helicobacter pylori infections
- Also suitable for preventive use.
- 60 vegan capsules for 30 days.
- With Pylopass™ - Innovative, effective, preventive

- Also suitable for preventive use.

Pylopass™ Lactobacillus reuteri DSM17648 (inactivated): 400 mg (equivalent to 2 times 10^10 CFU).
Take one capsule 2 times a day with water on an empty stomach (before meals).
Supplemental balanced diet. Not for use as a sole source of nutrition. Use under medical supervision. Store at room temperature in a dry place, away from light. Keep out of reach of children.
